review_text: The course was great. Ive learnt some new stuff . I wish there were more videos regarding special effects and lifestyle shots because that`s the most tricky part in this craft.

I love this course, although some portion of it at the mid-course part is meant for the pro, i almost fall asleep, but its all worth it.

Thanks.
Amazing course with no fluff! All of it was great knowledge and to the point. I am looking forward to offering this service on Fiverr.
Great course super in depth.
This is my second course from this wonderful guy. You have really impacted a lot on me with this course. Thanks greatly.
Very inspiring course!
Interesting and easy to follow
The course was informative and gave me a few new tricks to try when retouching client photos. Kirk is an enjoyable teacher and has a great pace throughout the course.
Very knowledgeable instructor with good teaching skills.

Fantastic course!

I was looking for a course which could take my skills of product photography a bit further.

I learnt some new retouching techniques, which helped me with the most wanted white background style photo and lifestyle photography in a studio.

If your skills are beyond basics in photoshop and photography this is a course for you. The info is presented in a clear and concise manner.

Short sections which you can watch over and over again, allow you to practise new techniques on youe own photos.

For some with less experience with photoshop, some videos might drag on a little bit with too much info, but I was excited to see more and more of the content for each chapter. I specifically appreciate the information about copyrights and free stock photos.

I will look forward to another product photography course like this one in a future.

Kamila Bobrzak
Great content and videos
awesome course , learned some new tricks

Overall good course, but too basic things that might be helpful for new users.
There is no such "wow" type things.
great course!

Excellent course for the more technical and photographic manipulation aspects regarding the products. Recommended for those who use e-commerce, design packaging and everything related to the world of products. Well work Kirk, I look forward to following your next course.
Nice one
Thanks a lot for an effective course. It's helpful.
good one
Great Course!

This course was absolutely wonderful and really nailed down some key core practices and concepts I was having a hard time to figure out for a while. Even with my years of experience he was able to teach me a few things I did not think about before. Course is broken up into manageable chunks and the practice files are great to use. I highly recommend this course and thank you instructor for having a good audio and proof of concept of your teachings. I will be looking forward to ordering your courses in the future.
Good Knowledge
Excellent and Informative tools for learning about Product Photography Retouching
Loved the course! A lot of useful and practical details! It also has inspired me to create my own tutorial videos to share my personal touch.
This course was absolutely wonderful  !!!
Love It !!!
A great course. Unlike the courses in other learning flatforms, every time I follow a course in Fiverr learn, there are a lot of new things to learn. Kirk is an excellent mentor.

Nothing new for me on this course also I believe that there is some points could be done much better by the help of other techniques which will lead better and more accurate results. I think the course by itself could be useful for beginners to get information about the methods and tools. Thanks to the teacher for putting a lot of effort on this course!
great coures
Great ,Thank you so much.

One of the best photoshop courses I have seen. It does the job, meaning it really teaches you how to achieve that white background in many different ways.  Excellent lecturer! I am half-way into the course and eager to continue.  Highly recommended. NOTE: Some basic (really basic) knowledge of photoshop is a prerequisite!
awesome course.
I loved the course and I loved Kirk's way of teaching! Highly recommend it! Thank you!
Excellent! Best course I have ever take to learn it. No one second is loose and the results skills are just damn crazy! A Must for everyone ever desire to sell something online

I think Kirk's design of the smartwatch is really neat, awesome, and fancy. It's a good compromise between a classic and a smartwatch. Smartwatches are wearables. So, are smart clothes. He also seems to be an expert in 3D designing, where I am a total beginner, which makes it hard for me to follow.
Great for Photographer!
Not bad but not what I thought.

I have been working with Adobe products for 8+ years. 
I strongly recommend this course to Buigners & Intermediate, You will learn so much from this one course. If you are already an expert like me, Still I recommend this course by the end of the course you will learn at least a handful of new techniques. 
PS:  Buy the course it's worth each penny.

I gain more knowledge and get the better idea, then I practise these tools and editing method. and I had gain the new and easy tools in using photoshop. finally I got more practise and better idea about the product photography. I highly recommended this course.
This course was amazing! I really thought I knew a lot about Photoshop, but this course has made me seen so much other / better options. It's definitely perfect for my future work.
